ideas.title: Replace MCP tools with structured outputs
ideas.description: Use output_format instead of MCP tool calls for agent-to-state communication. Inject context via prompts, get structured output, persist in node functions.

ideas.title: Use LangGraph state for ephemeral data
ideas.description: Move data that doesn't need permanent storage into LangGraph state instead of file I/O. Examples: current bug being processed, entrypoints queue, in-progress classifications.

ideas.title: Add SQLite checkpointing
ideas.description: Use LangGraph's checkpoint system with SQLite backend to enable resume-from-failure, state history, and debugging capabilities.

ideas.title: Extract TDD subgraph as reusable pattern
ideas.description: The reproduce → fix → refactor → review sequence is a general TDD pattern. Extract it as a subgraph that can be parameterized for different task types beyond bug fixing.

ideas.title: Self-managed repository cloning
ideas.description: Accept a repository URL as input and clone it to a temp location if not already available. This decouples the agent's work from existing local directories that may be used for other purposes, ensuring isolated and reproducible workflows.
